name: HALOGEN HEATER

name: USB LAPTOP COOLER PAD FAN WITH BLUE LIGHT
description:
This 3 fan notebook cooling pad with Blue LED lights keeps your notebook/laptop cool. It extends the life of your notebook by keeping it cool. The three built-in cooling fans pull the heat away from your notebook/laptop and prevent the CPU of your notebook/laptop from overheating! The acrylic housing of the cooling pad will look nice anywhere in your home. It is only powered by a USB and also allows you to add another USB device. Please note the laptop is not included ---------- Delivery
Please note delivery charges for products under 'OTHER' category is ONLY £3 and can take up to 7 working days to deliver. When purchased with clothing, this item will be sent separately and both clothing and 'other' charges will apply.

name: MOBILE PHONE MIRROR SCREEN PROTECTOR
description:
- Makes your phone LCD screen look like a mirror when the screen is shut off - When the screen is activated, the LCD screen contents appear like normal - Protect your phone front LCD screen against dust and scratches and eliminate glare - Designed for perfect fit with the LCD screen - Offers tough, durable, transparent surface while keeping the LCD screen clean and unscratched - Attaches smoothly with self-adhering surface; leaves no residue when removed - Accessory only, phone not included!
